Package it.polimi.se2019.controller.statePattern

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    State
    state interface, offers three methods * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BotMoveState
    this state allows the bot to be moved * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    BotShootState
    this class makes possible for the bot to shoot * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    ChooseHowToPayState
    this class allows payment * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    FFSetUpState
    implements the needed action to get the game ready for final frenzy * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    FinalScoringState  
    FirstSpawnState
    implements the very first spawn of each player * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    GameSetUpState
    this class set up the game options as desired by the user * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    GrabStuffState  
    GrabStuffStateDrawAndDiscardPowerUp
    in case a ammo card drew made it possible to draw a power up and user already holds too many, the state pattern will get here * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    GrabStuffStateDrawPowerUp
    in case a ammo card drew made it possible to draw a power up, the state pattern will get here * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    GrabStuffStateGrab  
    GrabStuffStateGrabWeapon
    this class allows the user to grab a weapon * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    GrabStuffStateMove
    this class allows the user to move somewhere else to grab * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    PowerUpAskForInputState
    asks whether the user want to use a power up or not and collects the answer * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    PowerUpState
    implements the usage of power ups * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    ReloadState
    implements reloading weapons * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    RunAroundState
    allows player to move around the map * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    ScoreKillsState
    When the turn of any user comes to an end, we score the dead players and make them spawn * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    ShootPeopleAskForInputState
    this state implements functions to ask the user a specific input for a given effect * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    ShootPeopleChooseEffectState
    give the user the possibility to choose the effect of the weapon he chose that he wants to use * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    ShootPeopleChooseWepState
    allow users to shoot * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    ShootPeopleState
    implements the shoot people state * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    SpawnState
    Implements the spawn of the players who died * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    TagBackGranadeState
    implements the tag back grenade functionality
    TargetingScopeState
    implements the targetingScope card
    TurnState
    implements the turn state actions * @author LudoLerma * @author FedericoMainettiGambera
    WantToPlayPowerUpState
    called after ReloadState and before ScoreKillsState /**starts the server
